description: This table contains the patient-specific measurements from flowsheets.

columns.name: FSD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the flowsheet data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.

columns.name: OCCURANCE
columns.description: If the flowsheet group/row appears multiple times, this will distinguish the occurrence.

columns.name: RECORDED_TIME
columns.description: The instant the reading was taken.

columns.name: ENTRY_TIME
columns.description: The instant the reading was entered.

columns.name: TAKEN_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user taking the flowsheet readings.

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user entering the readings.

columns.name: MEAS_COMMENT
columns.description: The free text comments associated with the reading.

columns.name: EDITED_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the previous value of an edited record.

columns.name: ISACCEPTED_YN
columns.description:
Determines if this flowsheet record has been accepted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IP_SIGNIFICANT_YN
columns.description:
This stores whether the flowsheet data is marked as significant. If a value is not marked as significant, this column returns NULL.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ISACCEPTED_YN

columns.name: CAPTURE_DEVICE_ID
columns.description: This item stores information of the Device ID for the device from which data is captured from.

columns.name: CAPTURE_DEVICE_ID_DEVICE_NAME
columns.description: The name for this device.

columns.name: RECEIVED_INSTANT
columns.description: Instant at which value was received at the interface

columns.name: NEEDS_COSIGN_C_NAME
columns.description:
If this item is blank or 0 (No), then this flowsheet data does not need a cosign.  If this item is 1 (Required Yes), then a cosign is required for this data and can only be pended.  If this item is 2 (Chosen Yes), then a cosign has been requested for this data but it is not required.  If this item is 3 (Required Yes Can File), then a cosign is required for the data and the data can be filed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Required Yes


Chosen Yes


Required Yes Can File

columns.name: FLT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the flowsheet template (FLT) which was used to enter the data in this cell.

columns.name: FLT_ID_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name associated with this template.

columns.name: FLO_DAT_USED
columns.description: This column stores the contact date (DAT) of the flowsheet row or group that is used to define the data.

columns.name: FLO_CNCT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This column converts the contact date (DAT) of the flowsheet group or row to DTE, based on the value in column FLO_DAT_USED.

columns.name: USER_PENDED_BY_ID
columns.description: User ID of the user who pended this flowsheet value.

columns.name: INSTANT_PENDED_DTTM
columns.description: Date/time at which a flowsheet value is pended.

columns.name: ABNORMAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores whether or not the value is abnormal


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes

columns.name: THRDPRTY_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Identifies the third-party framework that a Flowsheets value originally came from, if applicable. Intended to be used to track values that are sourced from health/fitness frameworks (e.g. Apple's HealthKit) to provide additional context when examining attached metadata.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Apple HealthKit


Withings


Fitbit


Google Fit


FHIR

columns.name: PAT_REPORTED_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates if the data was directly entered by the patient or a patient proxy and whether the data has been validated by a clinician


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Patient Reported


Patient reported, not clinician validated


Patient reported, clinician validated

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The MyChart account from which the data was entered.

columns.name: IS_FROM_SPEECH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a filed flowsheet value was entered using speech entry.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ISACCEPTED_YN

columns.name: ABNORMAL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores metadata for abnormal flowsheet values. It is only populated for data where ABNORMAL_C - Abnormal is set to 1-Yes. It is set to 1-Low for data that is below the minimum warning level and it is set to 2-High for data that is above the maximum warning level for flowsheet data of types: numeric, blood pressure, temperature, height, patient height, weight and patient weight. It is set to 0-Unspecified for data that is abnormal for other reasons. This is the only value that can be set for flowsheet data of type: custom list.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unspecified


Low


High


Patient-Entered Flowsheet Rule Abnormal

columns.name: FLO_NETWORKED_INI
columns.description: The INI to which the value for this row is associated.

columns.name: FLO_CATEGORY_INI
columns.description: The INI of a category flowsheet value

columns.name: FLO_CATEGORY_ITEM
columns.description: The item number of a category flowsheet value

columns.name: FLO_CATEGORY_VALUE
columns.description: The category value of a flowsheet row

columns.name: DOC_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the method the user used to enter the line of flowsheet data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Value From Macro

columns.name: MACRO_RECORD_ID
columns.description: When the documentation method in FSD-1360 is 1-Value From Macro this is the macro HGM record ID.

columns.name: MACRO_RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Scripting Template.
